1: <pb/><t>Walc'ual,</t> <t>chixoc il</t> <t>che u tatabexic ri pixbenic</t> <t>ri cuya' ri i tat chiwe;</t> <t>kas chitatabej ri cubij chiwe,</t> <t>rech quirik utzalaj chomanic.</t>
2: <t>Nu yo'm jun utzalaj tijonic chiwe,</t> <t>jeri' chi ma ta mixoc il</t> <t>chque tak ri e nu tijonic.</t>
3: <t>In xukuje' in uxinak alc'ualaxel:</t> <t>sibalaj nim ri nu lok'al</t> <t>chuwäch ri nu nan,</t>
4: <t>ri nu tat je nu pixbexic wa' xubano:</t> <t>“Chebatz'ibaj pa ri a chomabal</t> <t>ri e nu tzij;</t> <t>chanimaj ri takanic ri quinya' chawe,</t> <t>catc'asi' c'u na.</t>
5: <t>Charika' ri no'j</t> <t>xukuje' utzalaj chomanic;</t> <t>mebasach ri nu tzij.</t>
6: <t>Lok' chawila' wi ri no'j</t> <t>maya' apan jela'</t> <t>cuya' c'u na ri u to'banic chawe.</t>
7: <t>Chuwäch apachique jun jasach chic</t> <t>charika' ri no'j</t> <t>xukuje' utzalaj chomanic.</t>
8: <t>Chalok'ok'ej</t> <t>cunimarisaj c'u na a k'ij:</t> <t>chalak'apuj, nim c'u catril wi na;</t>
9: <t>¡cusipaj na</t> <t>jun je'lalaj wikbal a jolom</t> <t>are' c'u a corona wa' cucoj chajolom!”</t>
10: <pb/><t>Chebatatabej tak ri e nu tzij,</t> <t>nu c'ojol,</t> <t>chabana' awech chque,</t> <t>catcasi' c'u na q'ui junab.</t>
11: <t>Ri in catinc'am na bic</t> <t>pa ri be re ri no'j:</t> <t>quinban na chawe chi catbin</t> <t>pa ri utzalaj be,</t>
12: <t>chupam ri utzalaj be</t> <t>man e c'o ta k'atibal cärik na,</t> <t>pune' ta ne catxiq'uinic</t> <t>man cachak'ij ta na awib.</t>
13: <t>Co chachapa' awib</t> <t>che ri tijonic matzokopij c'ut;</t> <t>chabana' jas ri cubij,</t> <t>c'aslemal c'u wa' chawe.</t>
14: <t>Matbe pa ri qui be</t> <t>ri e banal tak etzelal.</t> <t>Matakej u banic awe</t> <t>ri itzel qui c'aslemal.</t>
15: <t>Chak'ila' awib</t> <t>che ri awoc'owic pa ri qui be;</t> <t>chatasa' awib chquij,</t> <t>chatakej at ri a be,</t>
16: <t>man c'u quec'oji' ta pa jamaril</t> <t>we man caquiban ri lawaloyil;</t> <t>caquitzak ri qui waram</t> <t>we man caquibano</t> <t>chi c'o jachin cäkaj pa qui k'ab.</t>
17: <t>¡Ri qui wa xukuje' ri cuq'uia'</t> <t>are ri u banic ri etzelal</t> <t>xukuje' ri tokinic!</t>
18: <pb/><t>Ri qui be ri suc'alaj tak winak</t> <t>junam ruc' ri u sakaribal</t> <t>jun c'ac' k'ij:</t> <t>ri cäbe u q'uiyic c'ä cäjuluw na</t> <t>pa ronojel ri u juluwem.</t>
19: <t>Are' c'u ri qui be</t> <t>ri banal tak etzelal xa k'ekumalil;</t> <t>¡Mawi ne queta'm</t> <t>jas ruc' cäquipak'ij wi quib!</t>
20: <t>Chatoc il chque ri nu tzij,</t> <t>nu c'ojol;</t> <t>chebaya' a xiquin che qui tatabexic.</t>
21: <t>Mawi jubik' mebel chawäch,</t> <t>¡chebatz'ibaj pa ri a chomabal!</t>
22: <t>E are' queyo'w c'aslemal</t> <t>xukuje' rutzil wächaj</t> <t>che ronojel ri cärikowic.</t>
23: <t>Chachajij ri a chomabal</t> <t>chuwäch apachique</t> <t>jasach ri c'o cho ri uwächulew,</t> <t>che c'ut caq'uiy wi ri c'aslemal.</t>
24: <t>Chak'ila' awib</t> <t>che qui bixic jastak ri xa quesubunic;</t> <t>chanajtajisaj awib</t> <t>che u banic banoj tzij.</t>
25: <t>Amak'el chawäch chatca'y wi apanok,</t> <t>chatca'y amak'el chawäch.</t>
26: <t>Kas chawila' na</t> <t>jawije' quebe a ya' wi ri awakan,</t> <t>amak'el c'ut</t> <t>catac'alej na cowilaj ulew.</t>
27: <t>Majuluch'ij ri a be;</t> <t>chak'ila' awib che qui ya'ic</t> <t>ri itzel tak u xo'l awakan.</t>
